content.question: A particle moves on the circle <math alttext="x squared, plus y squared, equals 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> in the <math alttext="x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-plane for time <math alttext="t is greater than or equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. At the time when the particle is at the point <math alttext="with coordinates 8 comma 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, the value of <math alttext="the derivative of x, with respect to t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> is 5. What is the value of <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> at this time?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals, the negative of the fraction 20 over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>20</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals, negative four thirds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals, five thirds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals, the negative of the fraction 20 over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>20</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the meaning of mathematical solutions in context.
